item.title: Small extreme samples.
item.description: div#TOC li { list-style:none; background-image:none; background-repeat:none; background-position:0; } K&T hospital scenario. The date are discussed in a blog by Paul Barden on the Understanding Uncertainty site and on his own blog. Note that data for Wales is not included, as it was reported for the whole of Wales rather than by region.
